Summary: Went to the store at 945 and saw 3 orange orbs in a triangle formation
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Granger
There were no other sightings in Granger on or around August 2nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWoke up out of dead sleep around 940 and went to cvs before it closed and pulling out of my neighborhood saw 3 orange orbs in a triangle formation. Went home and watched them for 2 hours. They came up one by one and formed a triangle or straight or horizontal lines. They would dart off one by one and dissapear every 10 mins or so!
